definition: container for holding and pouring water (or other liquid): jug, pitcher, clay jar, jerry can, water bottle etc
honey pot/fig. comfortable living conditions/privileged environment
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
lit. to smash a cracked pot (idiom); crazy despair in the face of a blemish, defect, error or setback

sentences.english: Now you can know exactly how much change is in the pig.
sentences.chinese: 現在，你可以清楚地知道你的儲錢罐裏存了多少錢了。

sentences.english: The Polya urn problem is a famous model of wide application in probability.
sentences.chinese: 波利亞罐問題是概率論中的著名模型。

sentences.english: He brought me a can of Red Bull.
I bought three cans of Alpo and stuffed them into my leather coat.
sentences.chinese: 我買了3罐狗食，塞進了皮衣口袋。

sentences.english: All Stainless Steel lid, tank, shell, wetted parts and fittings.
sentences.chinese: 全不鏽鋼蓋，罐，貝殼，溼零件及配件。

sentences.english: Prolonged pressure caused the sternum to snap in half and the ribs to break.
sentences.chinese: 大型瓦斯罐由於受到爆震波的壓擠破裂倒塌了。

sentences.english: “Get you some wasp spray, ” she says. “It’ll put their eyes out.”
sentences.chinese: “你去搞罐殺蟲噴霧劑，”她說，“噴瞎他們。”

sentences.english: The first year, sales averaged 9 drinks per day.
sentences.chinese: 第一年飲料的平均銷售爲一天9罐。

sentences.english: It is a little man made of china.
sentences.chinese: 這儲錢罐是一箇中國製造的小男人。

sentences.english: When I tried to lift the jug, the handle came off.
sentences.chinese: 我剛一提這個罐，把兒就掉了。

sentences.english: A jug usually has a spout or a narrow neck, and a handle.
sentences.chinese: 細口罐通常都有壺嘴或是細頸及手柄。

sentences.english: I think that the on-site training will feel necessary for the tank.
sentences.chinese: 我想槽罐焊接做事的現場培訓是必要的。

sentences.english: Who stole the cookies from the cookie jar?
sentences.chinese: 仙蒂從餅乾罐裏面偷走了餅乾？

sentences.english: A146 –presently this special provision refers only to fuel cell cartridges containing flammable liquids.
sentences.chinese: 目前僅指含易燃液體的燃料電池罐。

sentences.english: A large diesel tank leaked its contents into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一個大柴油罐裏的油漏進了河裏。

sentences.english: Please make the fruit jar airtight.

definition: to divide into portions/to package in smaller quantities/to separate into loads
